import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import "./Navbar.css"; import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setMenu]=useState("shop"); const {getTotalCartItems}=useContext return (

    :<>}

    :<>}
  • {setMenu("womens")}}>Women{menu==="womens"?

) } export default Navbar
